oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farm management issues in organic agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santucci, Fabio M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various aspects of farm management are analysed, which can be of interest for farmers, advisors and policy makers. The basic tools of management are recalled, as well as yields and labour demand.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: DSEEA - Section of Economics and Appraisal
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Santucci, Fabio M. (2011) Farm management issues in organic agriculture. DSEEA - Section of Economics and Appraisal, Italy.
